parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search for languages by tag or English name

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of licenses returned

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of organizations returned

parameters.name: onlyUnassociated
parameters.description: Get only organizations that are not associated with a user

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of users returned

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Email or uuid of the user

parameters.name: uuids
parameters.description: Array of user UUIDs to get organizations for. Minimum length of 1, maximum length of 100.

post.summary: Add a user to an organization
Change a user's email directly without validation or verification. Intended for API actors with sufficent permissions.

400.description: Bad Request: Request is malformed or email is already in use

patch.summary: Disable a user's account. Intended for API actors with sufficent permissions.

400.description: Bad Request: Request is malformed or user account is already disabled
